title: What are the negative consequences of making the right choice for the wrong reasons? - Quora

response.answer_text: choices.. you see choices are only the thing that matter in the end.. but the reason for making a choice is more important.. if you are choice for a wrong reason, chances are that you aren't making choice only at the first place.. why would anyone make a choice for wrong reasons? maybe that is not a choice for him.. that maybe the only option present for him.. right choices are generally the difficult ones.. you need a lot of courage and determination for making the right choice.. you always what is the right choice.. but do not choose it because you think you are not capable of doing it.. now if some situation arises and you are left with that choice only.. but the problem, you see, is that you are still the same person who thought he was not strong enough to make that right choice for right reasons.. now when other options will available to you, you will slip away.. you will want to go for the simpler things which you think you are capable of.. so, that you see, is the negative consequence for making the right choice for the wrong reasons.. you will never be able to do justice to the choice.. and though choices are the thing that matter.. but the reasons for making the choices are much much more important!

One negative consequence is that you might not notice that you made the choice for the wrong reasons. Seeing the good result, you may conclude that the reasons were good too, and be more prone to make future choices that don’t work out as well.
